Anal fissures can occur due to various reasons, including constipation, diarrhea, childbirth, and inflammatory bowel disease. Symptoms often include:

  • Itching or irritation around the anal area

These symptoms can significantly impact the quality of life, making it essential for patients to seek appropriate care.
